**My summary:**

This is one of the few posts on this website that is from myself, the head
curator.

This post goes through the history of data science, from the beginnings of
statistics centuries ago, through today, where:

> Statistics, Data Analysis, and Coding converge to form a new career for the
> 21st century

While many of the elements of data science have been around for a long time
(even the idea of machine learning, AI, and the perceptron date back to the
1950s), the profession of data science / data scientist seems to have emerged
around 2008.

Here is the link again to their blog post for more details:
[A Brief History of Data Science](https://open.substack.com/pub/featuringdata/p/1-a-brief-history-of-data-science?r=9cx2t)
